name: Garadget-SmartGarage
0:
”Alexa, tell Smart Garage to close all doors”
”Alexa, ask Smart Garage the status of workshop garage”
”Alexa, ask Smart Garage about recent events”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart garage
des:
Control and monitor your Garadget-equipped garage doors.

Security Note: Currently Alexa does not authenticate the person issuing the request. Anybody within its hearing distance can command it to open your garage doors.
